SEARCH
Package source.ViewModels

Interface IViewModel

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseViewModel, CampCommitteeSuggestionViewModel, CampCommitteeViewModel, EditCampDetailsViewModel, HomeViewModel, LoginViewModel, ProfileViewModel, ReplyEnquiryViewModel, SortViewModel, StaffCampViewModel, StaffInChargeOperationsViewModel, StaffSuggestionViewModel, StartViewModel, StudentCampViewModel, StudentEnquiryViewModel, StudentOperationsViewModel
public interface IViewModel
The IViewModel interface abstracts the functions and provides a state machine like structure for a view manager to carry out state transitions
Since:
11/4/2023
Author:
Isaac Chun
